Thank you!

Sandra

messages.subject: we are new also/ Re: [AlwaysLearning] new
messages.msgSnippet: Namaste all!  I am new here also : )  My two are Brendan (20) & Amber (10 on the 23rd.) I homeschooled/unschooled Brendan from 3rd grade on. Amber has always
messages.messageBody:
Namaste all! I am new here also : ) My two are Brendan (20) & Amber (10 on
the 23rd.) I homeschooled/unschooled Brendan from 3rd grade on. Amber has
always been schooled at home. I have been reading the posts for a couple of
months now and really appreciated everyone! I am very happy to be a part of
this group. We are in Gulf Breeze, Florida (panhandle next to Pensacola.) In
May we joined the local unschooling group (LIFE) directed by an AWESOME
person, Ren..many of you know her here : ) ...peace all, Sonja

PS. Hi Sandra. I've read so many of your articles. Your insight is VERY much
appreciated!


>From: "taughtbyfaith" <jones4494@...>
>Reply-To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
>To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [AlwaysLearning] new
>Date: Wed, 01 Oct 2003 03:30:50 -0000
>
>Hello Everyone,
> I am new here and I have one daughter who is 8..
>Gosh,, I don't really know where to begin but I do know she just
>loves to play all the time and I do not... What a match..
>Unschooling,,, I have tried it and stopped and tried again...
>Relaxed... I am that... We live in Fl...
>Nice to meet you all.
>Dana and Auburn
>
